item.description:
In my opinion, this is the best time of the year for the beach...no crowds, sunburns, traffic, or parking meters Especially if it is preceded by the best brunch in York

 

We'll meet at York Harbor Inn for a yum brunch.  Here is the link to their web site:

http://www.yorkharborinn.com/dining/menu/

Just click on menu and then Sunday brunch menu.  Their omelet combos are super!  They also have specials as well.

They have a fireplace going in the lobby - we can meet near the fireplace, have some coffee (starting at 10:00).  Brunch will be at 10:30.  After that, we can go for a walk on the beach or up to the Nubble Lighthouse.  Tide will be outgoing  -the beach is really neat when you have it all to yourself - almost!

Let me know if you need directions - straightforward on Google.  It's about 5 miles from the York toll booths.  As most of you know, the toll is now $3.00 Not to worry though - if you want to save $3.00 just get off Exit 19 (Wells); no off ramp toll there - and drive down Route 1 through Ogunquit and then York.
item.name: Brunch at York Harbor Inn and walk on the beach!
